Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the New York Times did not retract its story. The expert's verdict provides evidence that the New York Times did not retract the story but only acknowledged some faults.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the retraction of the New York Times' story. The expert's verdict clarifies that the New York Times did not retract the story entirely.
